name: Sticky Walls (macieciel123)
description:
Chromium browsers recommended for best performance (it actually runs worse on Firefox lol)

It's a short game with 3 simple levels made using TurboWarp. It's inspired by and based on Stick With It by Sam Hogan. Controls are in the game, click the "?" button.

You can also play it on Scratch, but it won't work correctly without TurboWarp.
Music by Bensound.

There are 2 known bugs:

  • Retry and home buttons have bad looking fade transitions.
  • If the blue ball touches normal ground and "pushing" ground at the same time, the game plays the same sound effect over and over again until the blue ball moves away.
  • It works like crap on Firefox. It's not a bug, it's a feature.
